resources.string: If you are not familiar with how this App works, simply enter some of the following measurements, if available. The application will take the two nutritional facts from the next meal, entered below, and returns the recommended dose of insulin to be given, along with some other useful information.
The recommended dose of insulin, given the values above, is ~ %1$d units.
The mg/dl increase from sugar is..\n\t\t ~ %1$d mg/dL
The mg/dl increase from carbs is..\n\t\t ~ %1$d mg/dL
The mg/dl increase from boths sugars and carbs is..\n\t\t ~ %1$d mg/dL

•Before or After a Meal
 •Before or After exercise
 •Before bed and after waking in the morning

 *If you begin to feel new or worsening symptoms contact your doctor immediately.
Displays the recommended dose of insulin given the values above.
Displays the mg/dL contribution from Sugars.
Displays the mg/dL contribution from Carbohydrates.
Displays the total Increase in mg/dL from both Sugars and Carbohydrates.
Here you can enter the results of your recent blood sugar tests and view them in a chart on the next tab.
